question:
Consider the following statements about the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness and Innovations (CEPI):
  1. It is an initiative of World Health Organization (WHO)
  2. It aims to finance and coordinate the development of new vaccines
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is incorrect because CEPI is currently being steered by five founding partners. They are: Department of Biotechnology, Ministry of Science & Technology, GOI; Government of Norway; Wellcome Trust; Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation; and World Economic Forum. Second statement is correct because it aims to finance and coordinate the development of new vaccines and contain infectious disease epidemics.
